root.query: select CopkchildId,CopkChildName,CoViewName from tadnreportchild where copkchildid='11.2'
select CopkchildId,CopkChildName,CoViewName from tadnreportchild where copkchildid='11.3'
select CopkchildId,CopkChildName,CoViewName from tadnreportchild where copkchildid='11.5'
select top 1 CopkchildId from tadnreportchild where copkchildid='11.5'
select top 1 CopkchildId from tadnreportchild where copkchildid='11.3'
select top 1 CopkchildId from tadnreportchild where copkchildid='11.2'
